name: Advanced Weather Companion
description:
Advanced Weather Companion with comprehensive features and multiple weather data sources:
- Dynamic location detection with BigDataCloud reverse geocoding
- Manual location override with Open-Meteo geocoding
- Multiple weather providers: Open-Meteo, Meteosource, Wttr.in, OpenWeatherMap, WeatherAPI
- Temperature unit selection and weather insights
- Extreme weather alerts and trend analysis
- Hourly and daily forecasts with customizable display
